body: I like the direction of this change, getting rid of our custom fetch thing and especially the explicit dispatching post-fetch instead of the implied post-fetch actions is a good direction to move in. 👍
body_text: I like the direction of this change, getting rid of our custom fetch thing and especially the explicit dispatching post-fetch instead of the implied post-fetch actions is a good direction to move in. 👍
